verses.verse: וַיֹּ֧סֶף <WH3254> Then again אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> Abraham וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <WH8034> and her name קְטוּרָֽה׃ <WH6989> [was] Keturah

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> And she bare ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> זִמְרָן֙ <WH2175> him Zimran וְאֶת־ <WH853> יָקְשָׁ֔ן <WH3370> and Jokshan וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְדָ֖ן <WH4091> and Medan וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> and Midian וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׁבָּ֖ק <WH3435> and Ishbak וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֽׁוּחַ׃ <WH7744> and Shuah

וְיָקְשָׁ֣ן <WH3370> And Jokshan יָלַ֔ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבָ֖א <WH7614> Sheba וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּדָ֑ן <WH1719> and Dedan וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons דְדָ֔ן <WH1719> of Dedan הָי֛וּ <WH1961> become אַשּׁוּרִ֥ם <WH805> were Asshurim וּלְטוּשִׁ֖ים <WH3912> and Letushim וּלְאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3817> and Leummim

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <WH5891> Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH6081> and Epher וַחֲנֹ֔ךְ <WH2585> and Hanoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <WH28> and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <WH420> and Eldaah כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> All these [were] the children קְטוּרָֽה׃ <WH6989> of Keturah
וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> gave אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֖וֹ לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> all that he had unto Isaac

וְלִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> But unto the sons הַפִּֽילַגְשִׁים֙ <WH6370> of the concubines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> which Abraham נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> had Abraham מַתָּנֹ֑ת <WH4979> gifts וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֞ם <WH7971> and sent them away מֵעַ֨ל <WH5921> and יִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> from Isaac בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son בְּעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> was still חַ֔י <WH2416> while he yet lived קֵ֖דְמָה <WH6924> eastward אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> unto the east

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These יְמֵ֛י <WH3117> And these [are] the days שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8141> of the years חַיֵּ֥י <WH2416> life אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> of Abraham's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after חָ֑י <WH2416> age מְאַ֥ת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years וְשִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> and seventy-five שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּגְוַ֨ע <WH1478> gave up the ghost וַיָּ֧מָת <WH4191> and died אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> Then Abraham בְּשֵׂיבָ֥ה <WH7872> old age טוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> in a good זָקֵ֣ן <WH2205> an old man וְשָׂבֵ֑עַ <WH7649> and full וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <WH622> [of years] and was gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> to his people

וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <WH6912> buried אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> יִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> and Ishmael בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> And his sons אֶל־ <WH413> in מְעָרַ֖ת <WH4631> him in the cave הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <WH4375> of Machpelah אֶל־ <WH413> in שְׂדֵ֞ה <WH7704> in the field עֶפְרֹ֤ן <WH6085> of Ephron בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צֹ֙חַר֙ <WH6714> of Zohar הַֽחִתִּ֔י <WH2850> the Hittite אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> which [is] before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <WH4471> Mamre

הַשָּׂדֶ֛ה <WH7704> The field אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which קָנָ֥ה <WH7069> purchased אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> which Abraham מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons חֵ֑ת <WH2845> of Heth שָׁ֛מָּה <WH8033> there קֻבַּ֥ר <WH6912> buried אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> there was Abraham וְשָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> and Sarah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> his wife

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> of Abraham וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> that God אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> Isaac בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> and Isaac עִם־ <WH5973> by בְּאֵ֥ר לַחַ֖י רֹאִֽי׃ <WH883> the well Lahairoi ס

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these תֹּלְדֹ֥ת <WH8435> Now these [are] the generations יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> of Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֜ה <WH3205> bare הָגָ֧ר <WH1904> whom Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <WH4713> the Egyptian שִׁפְחַ֥ת <WH8198> handmaid שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> Sarah's לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> unto Abraham

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> and these שְׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> And these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <WH3458> of Ishmael בִּשְׁמֹתָ֖ם <WH8034> by their names לְתוֹלְדֹתָ֑ם <WH8435> according to their generations בְּכֹ֤ר <WH1060> the firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> of Ishmael נְבָיֹ֔ת <WH5032> Nebajoth וְקֵדָ֥ר <WH6938> and Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <WH110> and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <WH4017> and Mibsam
וּמִשְׁמָ֥ע <WH4927> And Mishma וְדוּמָ֖ה <WH1746> and Dumah וּמַשָּֽׂא׃ <WH4854> and Massa
חֲדַ֣ד <WH2301> Hadad וְתֵימָ֔א <WH8485> and Tema יְט֥וּר <WH3195> Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <WH5305> Naphish וָקֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6929> and Kedemah

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הֵ֞ם <WH1992> like בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> These [are] the sons יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> of Ishmael וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> and these שְׁמֹתָ֔ם <WH8034> and these [are] their names בְּחַצְרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2691> by their towns וּבְטִֽירֹתָ֑ם <WH2918> and by their castles שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten נְשִׂיאִ֖ם <WH5387> princes לְאֻמֹּתָֽם׃ <WH523> according to their nations

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> And these [are] the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <WH3458> of Ishmael מְאַ֥ת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וְשֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> and seven שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וַיִּגְוַ֣ע <WH1478> and he gave up the ghost וַיָּ֔מָת <WH4191> and died וַיֵּאָ֖סֶף <WH622> and was gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> unto his people

וַיִּשְׁכְּנ֨וּ <WH7931> And they dwelt מֵֽחֲוִילָ֜ה <WH2341> from Havilah עַד־ <WH5704> against שׁ֗וּר <WH7793> unto Shur אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [is] before מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> Egypt בֹּאֲכָ֖ה <WH935> as thou goest אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <WH804> toward Assyria עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> in the presence כָל־ <WH3605> of all אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> of all his brethren נָפָֽל׃ <WH5307> [and] he died פ

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֥ת <WH8435> And these [are] the generations יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> of Isaac בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham's אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> Abraham הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> Isaac

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become יִצְחָק֙ <WH3327> And Isaac בֶּן־ <WH1121> old אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> was forty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years בְּקַחְתּ֣וֹ <WH3947> when he took אֶת־ <WH853> רִבְקָ֗ה <WH7259> Rebekah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter בְּתוּאֵל֙ <WH1328> of Bethuel הָֽאֲרַמִּ֔י <WH761> the Syrian מִפַּדַּ֖ן אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> of Padanaram אֲח֛וֹת <WH269> the sister לָבָ֥ן <WH3837> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֖י <WH761> the Syrian ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיֶּעְתַּ֨ר <WH6279> intreated יִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> And Isaac לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD לְנֹ֣כַח <WH5227> for אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife כִּ֥י <WH3588> because עֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> because she [was] barren הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <WH6279> was intreated לוֹ֙ יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> conceived רִבְקָ֥ה <WH7259> of him and Rebekah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> his wife

וַיִּתְרֹֽצֲצ֤וּ <WH7533> struggled together הַבָּנִים֙ <WH1121> And the children בְּקִרְבָּ֔הּ <WH7130> within her וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and she said אִם־ <WH518> If כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> is so לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> am I וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> to enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD לָ֗הּ שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> unto her Two [גֹיִים כ] (גֹויִם֙ <WH1471> Gentile ק) בְּבִטְנֵ֔ךְ <WH990> [are] in thy womb וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two manner לְאֻמִּ֔ים <WH3816> of people מִמֵּעַ֖יִךְ <WH4578> from thy bowels יִפָּרֵ֑דוּ <WH6504> shall be separated וּלְאֹם֙ <WH3816> and [the one] people מִלְאֹ֣ם <WH3816> than [the other] people יֶֽאֱמָ֔ץ <WH553> shall be stronger וְרַ֖ב <WH7227> and the elder יַעֲבֹ֥ד <WH5647> shall serve צָעִֽיר׃ <WH6810> the younger

וַיִּמְלְא֥וּ <WH4390> were fulfilled יָמֶ֖יהָ <WH3117> And when her days לָלֶ֑דֶת <WH3205> to be delivered וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold תוֹמִ֖ם <WH8380> behold [there were] twins בְּבִטְנָֽהּ׃ <WH990> in her womb

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> came out הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> And the first אַדְמוֹנִ֔י <WH132> red כֻּלּ֖וֹ <WH3605> all כְּאַדֶּ֣רֶת <WH155> garment שֵׂעָ֑ר <WH8181> all over like an hairy וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> and they called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau

וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵ֞ן <WH3651> after that יָצָ֣א <WH3318> out אָחִ֗יו <WH251> his brother וְיָד֤וֹ <WH3027> and his hand אֹחֶ֙זֶת֙ <WH270> took hold בַּעֲקֵ֣ב <WH6119> heel עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> on Esau's וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> and his name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Jacob וְיִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> and Isaac בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> [was] threescore שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בְּלֶ֥דֶת <WH3205> when she bare אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַֽיִּגְדְּלוּ֙ <WH1431> grew הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> And the boys וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> became עֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> and Esau אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> a man יֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> was a cunning צַ֖יִד <WH6718> hunter אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man שָׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> and Jacob אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man תָּ֔ם <WH8535> [was] a plain יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> dwelling אֹהָלִֽים׃ <WH168> in tents

וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <WH157> loved יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> And Isaac אֶת־ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> Esau כִּי־ <WH3588> because צַ֣יִד <WH6718> of [his] venison בְּפִ֑יו <WH6310> because he did eat וְרִבְקָ֖ה <WH7259> but Rebekah אֹהֶ֥בֶת <WH157> loved אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וַיָּ֥זֶד <WH2102> sod יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob נָזִ֑יד <WH5138> pottage וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> and Esau מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> from the field וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he עָיֵֽף׃ <WH5889> and he [was] faint

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said עֵשָׂ֜ו <WH6215> And Esau אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> to Jacob הַלְעִיטֵ֤נִי <WH3938> Feed נָא֙ <WH4994> Please מִן־ <WH4480> me I pray thee with הָאָדֹ֤ם <WH122> that same הָאָדֹם֙ <WH122> red הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> he כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָיֵ֖ף <WH5889> [pottage] for I [am] faint אָנֹ֑כִי <WH595> I עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that קָרָֽא־ <WH7121> called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> therefore was his name אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> Edom
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> And Jacob מִכְרָ֥ה <WH4376> Sell כַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> me this day אֶת־ <WH853> בְּכֹֽרָתְךָ֖ <WH1062> thy birthright לִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> And Esau הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> Behold I [am] at the point לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> to die וְלָמָּה־ <WH4100> of what זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> he לִ֖י בְּכֹרָֽה׃ <WH1062> and what profit shall this birthright

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> And Jacob הִשָּׁ֤בְעָה <WH7650> Swear לִּי֙ כַּיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> to me this day וַיִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> and he sware ל֑וֹ וַיִּמְכֹּ֥ר <WH4376> unto him and he sold אֶת־ <WH853> בְּכֹרָת֖וֹ <WH1062> his birthright לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> unto Jacob

וְיַעֲקֹ֞ב <WH3290> Then Jacob נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לְעֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> Esau לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> bread וּנְזִ֣יד <WH5138> and pottage עֲדָשִׁ֔ים <WH5742> of lentiles וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> and he did eat וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> and drink וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> and rose up וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <WH1980> and went וַיִּ֥בֶז <WH959> despised עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> thus Esau אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <WH1062> [his] birthright ס
